name: Fundumental Point Defense Integration
desc:
Gives all small non-missile weapons the ability to automatically target incoming enemy missiles and to identify - and ignore - decoy flares. Targeting missiles takes priority over targeting enemy ships or fighters.

In addition, all point-defense weapons get the best possible target leading, regardless of combat readiness, and all damage to missiles is increased by %s. On top of this, all point-defense weapons gain a range extension of %s.

name: Structural Weakness
desc: Armor plates will explode when these explode;.

name: Projected Solar Shielding
desc:
Utilizes p-space to establish a thin baryon field around the ship's fighters, reducing the effect a star's corona may have on the fighter. 

In combat, reduces the energy damage fighters take by %s.
sModDesc: Increases the protection from solar coronae and similar hazards to %s.
